rows.label: tev022101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev022101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Alesa about her work.

rows.label: tev022101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev022101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Alesa about recent developments.

rows.label: tev022101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Alesa what she did during the enemy attack.

rows.label: tev022101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Alesa about the battle for the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev022101_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Alesa what she intends to do now.

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, my dear Wersal! How are you?
We just got some new skirts in if you'd care to
take a look?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0002
rows.name:
On a Ma-non frame, these skirts would make a
lovely one-piece dress. I really cannot recommend
them highly enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0003
rows.name:
...See? I'm serving all customers now!
That right there is how I tend to the special needs
of my treasured Ma-non clients.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0004
rows.name:
This will be a test of my customer-service abilities.
I have to get back out there and move some product![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0008
rows.name:
I heard you were able to help my husband,
Matthew, with a problem he'd been having.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0009
rows.name:
Matthew was able to get comfortable around the
Ma-non right away. How I envy him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm sure it's because he's such an empathic person.
Back on Earth, he always used to bring home stray
cats and bats and whatnot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Not that I'm comparing the Ma-non to animals!
Those were just...examples! That's all. Yes. Examples.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0020
rows.name:
After we were told to evacuate to the
Ma-non ship, Wersal led me right to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0021
rows.name:
The ship flew away from the city,
and we returned without suffering a single casualty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0022
rows.name:
The me I used to be? The one who couldn't tolerate the
Ma-non? She surely would have died in the city after
refusing to evacuate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0023
rows.name:
I owe my life to you, [ST:playername ],
and to Wersal. So thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0039
rows.name:
My husband has been so busy lately that on the rare
occasions he does return home, he heads right back
out a few hours later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0040
rows.name:
Those of us in the commercial district support crew
may not be able to help you in combat...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0041
rows.name:
But by supporting my mechanic husband,
I like to think that I'm indirectly supporting you
and all the other BLADEs out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0042
rows.name:
So keep smacking down those evil-doers,
and make sure you stop by for all your
high-quality fashion needs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0050
rows.name:
My husband and I are finally able to converse with
each other at home again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0051
rows.name:
Lately, he'd been so busy that he'd come home and
collapse into bed without a word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0052
rows.name:
You should try to make some time for the people
who are important to you, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022101_MSG0053
rows.name:
And when you do, make sure that instead of wearing
your grungy combat clothes, you're clad in a new and
stylish outfit from my boutique![ST:wait ]
